Class Rhombus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shapes
      • TwoDimensionalShape
        • Polygons
          • Quadrilaterals
            • Parallelogram
              • Rhombus

  • public class Rhombus
extends Parallelogram
    Class Rhombus extends from Parallelogram as it shares multiple traits with the class. The class does require an Override method however as its area is found in a significantly different fashion to other parallelograms.
    Author:
    Kyle Dorcey

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rhombus

        public Rhombus(java.lang.String shapeName,
               double base,
               double base2,
               double side,
               double side2,
               double diagonal,
               double diagnola2)
        Class constructor for Rhombus
        Parameters:
        shapeName - String containing the user defined name of the shape
        base - length of the base
        base2 - Length of the side opposite to base
        side - Length of the side
        side2 - Length of the side opposite of "side"
        diagonal - Length of one of the rhombus's diagonals
        diagnola2 - Length of the other diagnola

    • Method Detail

      • setArea

        private static double setArea(double diagonal,
                              double diagonal2)
        Finds area of the rhombus. The method is static as it is called during construction
        Parameters:
        diagonal - Length of one of the rhombus's diagonals
        diagonal2 - Length of the other diagonal
        Returns:
        Area of the rhombus

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Overrides:
        getArea in class Parallelogram
        Returns:
        the area of the rhombus. Overriden so as to not accidentally call Parallelograms method
